titles.title: A bill to extend the authority of, and provide hiring authority for, the Global Engagement Center.
A bill to extend the authority of, and provide hiring authority for, the Global Engagement Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill extends the authorization for the Global Engagement Center of the Department of State through calendar year 2027, and it provides the State Department with hiring authority for the center that is not controlled by requirements for competitive service positions or classification and general schedule pay rates.
